        <condition>gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.case_contributor_creator') && !gs.hasRole('admin') &&  !gs.hasRole('sn_esm_agent') &&  !gs.hasRole('sn_esm_location_agent') &&  !gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.relationship_agent')</condition>
        <description/>

        <message/>
        <name>Validate contributor case create/update</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 this.validateAccount();
 this.validateConsumerAndHousehold();
 this.validateInternalUser();
})(current, previous);

function validateAccount(){
 // Account not set. No validation needed.
 if(gs.nil(current.account))
  return;
 
 // Account contributor can create cases for any account
 if(gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.account_contributor'))
  return;
 
 // A relationship contributor can only create cases for accounts he/she manages
 if(gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.relationship_contributor') && new sn_cs_base_ext.AccountManagerRelationshipUtil().hasAccessTo(current.account)) 
  return;

 // Allow update operation for case contributor creator role
 if(current.operation() == "update" && gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.case_contributor_creator'))
  return;

 // None of the other contributors should be allowed to create cases for accounts
 current.setAbortAction(true);
 gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("You cannot create cases for this account"));
}

function validateConsumerAndHousehold(){
 // Consumer not set. No validation needed.
 if(gs.nil(current.consumer))
  return;
 
 // Consumer contributor can create cases for any consumer
 if(gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.consumer_contributor'))
  return;
 
 // A relationship contributor can only create cases for consumers/households he/she manages
 if(gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.relationship_contributor') && new sn_cs_base_ext.RelationshipManagerUtil().hasAccessTo(current)) 
  return;

 // Allow update operation for case contributor creator role
 if(current.operation() == "update" && gs.hasRole('sn_customerservice.case_contributor_creator'))
  return;

 // None of the other contributors should be allowed to create cases for accounts
 current.setAbortAction(true);
 gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("You can only create cases for consumers for which you are relationship manager."));
}

function validateInternalUser(){
 // skip validation for update action
 if (current.operation() == "update")
  return;

 // internal_user is not set. Nothing to validate.
 if(gs.nil(current.internal_user+''))
  return;
 
 // Internal user should be the logged in user.
 if(gs.getUserID() == current.internal_user+'')
  return;
 
 current.setAbortAction(true);
 gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("You cannot create cases on behalf of another user"));
}]]></script>
